dict.string: Welcome to WPI Calendar Event Creator App!
Here is the main setup view. You may set some properties of event from here.
Here is an example of property you may change. Date and duration in this case.
You may choose professor right from the list! You may set favorite professors from the setup.
You may search for professor just typing his/her name or surname.
You may choose building/room from the list, or just tap "Professor's Office". App knows, where it is.
You may preview the event, you are about to create.
If you choose professor from the app's database, app may send him/her an email-reminder.
